data.title: Ken Olin Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Ken Olin on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Ken Olin including This Is Us, Freaks and Geeks, and more.
data.text:
All That Remains

When the daughters of Bruce Morrison (Ken Olin), a writer whose wife mysteriously vanished a year ago, go missing on the anniversary of their mother's disappearance, the BAU is brought in to study Morrison as a possible suspect.

The Feast of Epiphany

Isaac and Kitty plan a Town Hall for Robert as a last ditch effort to save his campaign; Nora plans a big family dinner to impress Isaac and give him; relations are strained and during the dinner all of the recent secrets are revealed.

Holy Matrimony

A political scandal and a severe case of cold feet threaten Kitty and Robert's highly anticipated wedding day; Isaac distracts Nora from her romance with Stan; Holly gets a surprise visit from an old friend.

Seperation Anxiety

McCallister makes a big decision about his candidacy; Nora faces her deepest fears when Isaac asks her to move to Washington DC with him; Sarah finds her business sense clouded by her growing feelings for Graham; Rebecca celebrates her first birthday as a Walker - with the entire family.
